product_name: L'OrealRevitalift 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid + Caffeine Under Eye Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGive BackL'Oreal Revitalift 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid + Caffeine Under Eye Serum for younger-looking eyes in 2 weeks.
details: DetailsBenefits1.5% Pure Hyaluronic Acid serum and 1% pure caffeine undereye serum to visibly replump, brighten eyesNon-greasy serum with 1.5% Pure Hyaluronic Acid serum to smooth and re-energize1% Pure Caffeine to help noticeably reduce appearance of dark circles and puffinessFragrance and Paraben freeFeaturesApply the under eye serum with Triple Roller applicator for a full eye contour massage to help depuff under eyesVisible Results - Skin feels moisturized, Fine lines, crow's feet are visibly smoother, skin feels firmerEyes look younger, less tired; over time, dark circles look noticeably brighterValidated in partnership with an advisory panel of dermatologists through: comprehensive ingredient screening for efficacy, safety & toleranceItem 2586906How To UseMassage onto clean skin every morning and evening. Dip the applicator into the bottle once and smooth over your eyelid, massaging in small circles under the eye to the temple, repeating 4 times. Gently tap in excess with fingers. Repeat for the other eye. Proceed with your usual skincare routine.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Citric Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Chlorphenesin Fil B274593/1.
how_to_use: Massage onto clean skin every morning and evening. Dip the applicator into the bottle once and smooth over your eyelid, massaging in small circles under the eye to the temple, repeating 4 times. Gently tap in excess with fingers. Repeat for the other eye. Proceed with your usual skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I love this product. It's a little tacky and sticky to wear under make up but other than that I love it. It is a good nighttime treatment.

reviews.headline: Can be used as grippy primer
reviews.comments: I'm not sure whether this stuff works because it's so incredibly sticky that I need to use an expensive eye cream over top or else my eyelids stick open. I don't have a primer that's near as sticky as this! Maybe I should use this as a grippy primer! I mean, really - what makes this stuff so much like glue?

reviews.headline: I use this every day.
reviews.comments: There has been improvement in dark circles and puffiness.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL (for me)
reviews.comments: Been using this serum for about a year and a half, and my under eyes have never looked better. It is a little tacky, but it stays put all through the night I wouldn't recommend under make up nor for daytime. Puffiness has subsided, and my under eyes have never been as smooth as they are right now fine lines have reduced as well.

reviews.headline: I like it, but I won't buy it again
reviews.comments: I like the serum itself.  I think it hydrates ok.  The main issue is the applicator contaminates the product.  It needs to be redesigned.

reviews.headline: Nope!
reviews.comments: This goes on really nice, but it dries very cakey, so not something I can use during the day or with makeup. Highlights my fine lines ðŸ‘Ž

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: Feels great going on but after using it for a few days, my undereyes are extremely red and itchy and they burn so bad when i put any other product on. This is my only new product I am using so I am left to assume that the irritation is from the serum. I dont have sensitive skin but this still managed to irritate my eyes.

reviews.headline: Overhyped
reviews.comments: Foundation didnt sit well on serum and peeled. Also, I didnt see any kind of change after about a month of use.

reviews.headline: 10/10 recommend
reviews.comments: This is a great product. I actually use mine after the shower before bed every single night. That ensures my face is clean so i dont discolor the liquid in the bottle like some people have noted, i use it nightly regardless of if my eyes feel puffy, and i dont experience the tacky feeling after it dries because i am asleep when it is on. 10/10 recommend. I have noticed so much improvement!

reviews.headline: Horrible product!!!!!
reviews.comments: This literally BURNT my undereyes! It hirts so bad and now they are all dried up amd red!

reviews.headline: Excellent under eye serum
reviews.comments: This product is fantastic!  It brightens and plumps under the eyes. I have tried many under eye creams, serums and eye patches and this is by far the best.  A great value!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I have been using this product around three months. It helps smooth the lines but does not help bags under eyes.

reviews.headline: â€¦
reviews.comments: This doesnt help with anything at all except to moisturirize the eyes, if thats your goal that just use a regular moisturizer. Waste of money.

reviews.headline: This really does work!
reviews.comments: This plus revitalize serum is CHEF'S KISS. I ONLY use this and the other serum and moisture on my face. I went to a face injection consultation and they turned me away and said I do NOT need it at all. THIS  WHOLE LINE IS AMAZING

reviews.headline: Noticed the difference in just one week
reviews.comments: I am using morning and before bedtime. Have definitely noticed a difference. I do use an additional eye cream on top of this product to reduce stickiness and for extra wrinkle reduction.

reviews.headline: irritated my eyes
reviews.comments: I tried using this nightly for a week or two and felt so much eye irritation, they were red and it was very painful. this is not gentle enough to use around the eyes.

reviews.headline: Product turned yellow after only a couple of weeks of use
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this product and to be fair i feel like I did see a slight difference to behin with. Im not sure if this is down to the metal applicator giving a cooling effect on the eye? The issue ive had with this product is that its turned yellow! Its barley been a couple of weeks. Its been stored correctly so im unsure if I just received a bad batch? However its clear from the other reviews mine is not an isolated incident.

reviews.headline: Be careful!
reviews.comments: This product was okay at first; however, after a few weeks of using this product, one of my eyes (bottom lid)  started getting red.  At first I thought it was a pimple but after applying this product again, I realized it was the product who was causing me an allergic reaction. I think the applicator after a while, gets contaminated, causing this unfortunate reaction to my eye. I wouldn't recommend this product at all.

reviews.headline: Never
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for about a month now, and it has become contaminated once again. The product always turns yellow before I can even finish the bottle. It is a waste of money and the product has done nothing discernable for me.

reviews.headline: Finally!!!!!
reviews.comments: For context I'm south asian and I have genetic dark circles.  I have tried tons and tons of products but nothing ever worked - not even a special diet!! This product does exactly what it says it does.  My dark circles are a lot less prominent and I don't even have to use a color corrector to hide them anymore.  I woke up this morning with bad dark circles, I put this on and within minutes my dark circles were almost completely gone!

media.headline: Never again
media.caption: Defective lid that has sharp edges.

media.headline: Trying you skin care product
media.caption: First time trying skin care line

faceoff_positive.comments: I am shocked! This stuff really works! I have used this morning and night for 7 days now and the difference in my eyes in unremarkable.
faceoff_positive.headline: Excellent eye serum

faceoff_negative.comments: I haven't really been able to use this product as I believe that the wand is broken.  It came this way and the only way that I can use it is to dab it on my skin and rub it in with my finger.  Not really sure if it works or not because of this.
faceoff_negative.headline: Broken?

rollup.name: Revitalift 2.5% Hyaluronic Acid + Caffeine Under Eye Serum
